flawed_nl_solution:
Hansel makes $30000 and received a 10% raise so his raise is 30000*0.1 = $3000
Hansel now makes 30000+ 3000 = $<<30000+3000=33000>>33000 a year
Gretel makes $30000 and received a 15% raise so her raise is 30000*0.15 = $5400
Gretel now makes 30000+5400 = $<<30000+5400=35400>>35400 a year
If Gretel makes $35400 a year and Hansel makes $33000 then Gretel makes 35400-33000 = $<<35400-33000=2400>>2400 more a year than Hansel
#### 2400

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4500, not 5400. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
